meanings.sent1: The karateists in the dojo were focused on their training.
meanings.sent2: Many karateists gathered at the tournament to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent3: The karateists decided to have a friendly competition to see who could break the most boards.
meanings.sent4: In the world of martial arts, karateists are like modern-day warriors.
meanings.sent5: The karateists moved with precision and grace, demonstrating their expertise in karate.

meanings.sent1: After the class, the karateists lined up to bow to their sensei.
meanings.sent2: The karateists from different dojos came together for a special training session.
meanings.sent3: The group of karateists looked like a sea of white uniforms in the dojo.
meanings.sent4: Among the karateists, there was a sense of camaraderie and mutual respect.
meanings.sent5: The karateists' unity and discipline were evident in their synchronized movements.
